TextToAdd.string:
Insert the Vault Relic in one of the obelisks to activate Mayhem.

When Mayhem is activated, the world becomes harder but yields greater rewards!

Mayhem Mode consists of varying difficulties. Fresh Vault Hunters want to start in Mayhem I and work their way up to Mayhem III for the best chances of loot.

Each Mayhem mode increases Enemy Health, Shields, and Armor but also greatly increases Cash, Eridium, Experience Gain, and Loot Chance!

Mayhem I

Loot Quality increased by 100%
Experience/Eridium/Cash increased by 200%
Enemy Health increased by 15%
Enemy Shields and Armor increased by 25%

Potential Mayhem Mods:
  • Bulletproof: Enemies take 15% less damage from normal bullets and attacks

  • Insulated: Enemies take 15% less damage from Incendiary damage

  • Icehard: Enemies take 15% less damage from Cryo damage

  • Grounded: Enemies take 15% less damage from Shock damage

  • Nuclear: Enemies take 15% less damage from Radiation damage

  • Cowabunga!: Enemies take 15% less damage from Corrosive damage

  • Savage: Enemies deal 10% more Weapon Damage

  • Swift: Enemy weapons have 7% increased Fire Rates

  • Fortified: Enemies have additional 15% more Health

  • Double Whammy: Enemies fire 1 additional Projectile

  • Precision: Enemy weapons are 20% more Accurate

  • Explosive: Enemy explosions have increased area of effect

  • Overwhelming: Players recover 30% less Shield (Shield Regen Rate & Delay) and Health Regen but Players gain 8% increased Movespeed, Fire Rate, and Reload Speed

  • Exposed: Players take more 15% damage from all Elemental damage but Players deal 15% more damage with Normal bullets

  • Skillful: Players deal 20% less damage with all Guns but Players gain 25% increased Cooldown Rate and deal more Skill Damage

  • Utilitarian: Players have 12% worse Accuracy and Handling but Players deal 30% increased Shield, Grenade, Melee, Slide, and Ground Slam Damage

  • Hit and Run: Players deal 20% less damage with Assault Rifles and Sniper Rifles but deal 20% increased damage with Pistols, SMGs, and Shotguns

  • Aim for the Head: Players deal 20% less damage with Pistols, SMGs, and Shotguns but Players deal 20% more damage with Assault Rifles and Sniper Rifles

  • You're a Wizard: Players deal 30% less damage with Normal bullets but Players deal 30% more damage with all Elemental damage

  • Sun's Out, Guns Out: Players deal 16% less damage with Action Skills and Grenades but Players deal 15% more damage with Guns

Mayhem II

Loot Quality increased by 300%
Experience/Eridium/Cash increased by 500%
Enemy Health increased by 50%
Enemy Shields and Armor increased by 75%

Potential Mayhem Mods:
  • Defendarius: Enemies have a chance to reflect projectiles

  • Bulletproof: Enemies take 30% less damage from normal bullets and attacks

  • Insulated: Enemies take 30% less damage from Incendiary damage

  • Icehard: Enemies take 30% less damage from Cryo damage

  • Grounded: Enemies take 30% less damage from Shock damage

  • Nuclear: Enemies take 30% less damage from Radiation damage

  • Cowabunga!: Enemies take 30% less damage from Corrosive damage

  • Savage: Enemies deal 25% more Weapon Damage

  • Swift: Enemy weapons have 14% increased Fire Rates

  • Fortified: Enemies have additional 30% more Health

  • Double Whammy: Enemies fire 1 additional Projectile

  • Precision: Enemy weapons are 35% more Accurate

  • Explosive: Enemy explosions have increased area of effect

  • Defendarius: Enemies have a 15% chance to Reflect projectiles back to player

  • Overwhelming: Players recover 50% less Shield (Shield Regen Rate & Delay) and Health Regen but Players gain 12% increased Movespeed, Fire Rate, and Reload Speed

  • Exposed: Players take more 30% damage from all Elemental damage but Players deal 30% more damage with Normal bullets

  • Skillful: Players deal 35% less damage with all Guns but Players gain 35% increased Cooldown Rate and deal more Skill Damage

  • Utilitarian: Players have 24% worse Accuracy and Handling but Players deal 40% increased Shield, Grenade, Melee, Slide, and Ground Slam Damage

  • Hit and Run: Players deal 35% less damage with Assault Rifles and Sniper Rifles but deal 35% increased damage with Pistols, SMGs, and Shotguns

  • Aim for the Head: Players deal 35% less damage with Pistols, SMGs, and Shotguns but Players deal 35% more damage with Assault Rifles and Sniper Rifles

  • You're a Wizard: Players deal 50% less damage with Normal bullets but Players deal 50% more damage with all Elemental damage

  • Sun's Out, Guns Out: Players deal 33% less damage with Action Skills and Grenades but Players deal 25% more damage with Guns

Mayhem III

Loot Quality increased by 500%
Experience/Eridium/Cash increased by 900%
Enemy Health increased by 100%
Enemy Shields and Armor increased by 150%

Potential Mayhem Mods:
  • Eridium Masks: Enemies take 30% less damage from critical damage

  • Defendarius: Enemies have a 30% chance to Reflect projectiles back to player

  • Bulletproof: Enemies take 50% less damage from normal bullets and attacks

  • Insulated: Enemies take 50% less damage from Incendiary damage

  • Icehard: Enemies take 50 less damage from Cryo damage

  • Grounded: Enemies take 50% less damage from Shock damage

  • Nuclear: Enemies take 50% less damage from Radiation damage

  • Cowabunga!: Enemies take 50% less damage from Corrosive damage

  • Savage: Enemies deal 40% more Weapon Damage

  • Swift: Enemy weapons have 20% increased Fire Rates

  • Fortified: Enemies have additional 45% more Health

  • Double Whammy: Enemies fire 2 additional Projectile

  • Precision: Enemy weapons are 50% more Accurate

  • Explosive: Enemy explosions have increased area of effect

  • Overwhelming: Players recover 70% less Shield (Shield Regen Rate & Delay) and Health Regen but Players gain 16% increased Movespeed, Fire Rate, and Reload Speed

  • Exposed: Players take more 45% damage from all Elemental damage but Players deal 45% more damage with Normal bullets

  • Skillful: Players deal 50% less damage with all Guns but Players gain 45% increased Cooldown Rate and deal more Skill Damage

  • Utilitarian: Players have 36% worse Accuracy and Handling but Players deal 50% increased Shield, Grenade, Melee, Slide, and Ground Slam Damage

  • Hit and Run: Players deal 50% less damage with Assault Rifles and Sniper Rifles but deal 50% increased damage with Pistols, SMGs, and Shotguns

  • Aim for the Head: Players deal 50% less damage with Pistols, SMGs, and Shotguns but Players deal 50% more damage with Assault Rifles and Sniper Rifles

  • You're a Wizard: Players deal 70% less damage with Normal bullets but Players deal 70% more damage with all Elemental damage

  • Sun's Out, Guns Out: Players deal 50% less damage with Action Skills and Grenades but Players deal 35% more damage with Guns
